text.text_translated:
Potentially Hazardous Asteroids are space rocks that come close to Earth.  
They pass as close as 7.5 million kilometres to Earth's orbit.  
NASA is the US group that studies space.  
NASA has made a map of 1,400 Potentially Hazardous Asteroids.  
They think none will threaten Earth in the next one hundred years.  
NASA can track these asteroids and guess if one could hit Earth.  
NASA can stop an asteroid in two ways.

feedback.feedback: FAIL: Fidelity Failure. The BERTScore of 0.8942 is below the required 0.90. This is because the phrase 'make predictions about possible impact' was simplified to 'guess if one could hit Earth', losing key technical wording, and 'defence solutions could be launched' was reduced to 'stop an asteroid in two ways', omitting 'defence'. Suggestion: Restore the original phrasing for precision, including 'make predictions about possible impact' and 'defence solutions could be launched'.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Potentially Hazardous Asteroids are space rocks.  
They pass inside 7.5 million kilometres of Earth’s orbit.  
NASA is a US space agency.  
NASA has a map of 1,400 of these asteroids.  
NASA thinks none will be a danger for 100 years.  
NASA already has technology to track these objects.  
NASA can guess if they will hit Earth.  
Then NASA can use two ways to protect Earth.
